turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Sandman (Dungeons & Dragons).
turn.1: What is the Sandman in Dungeons and Dragons?
turn.2: Sandman (Dungeons & Dragons) In the "Dungeons & Dragons" fantasy role-playing game, the sandman is a type of elemental creature.
turn.4: The sandman first appeared in "White Dwarf" #10 (December 1978).
turn.6: The sandman appeared in the original first edition "Fiend Folio" (1981).
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: The sandman appeared in second edition for the Al-Qadim setting in "Assassin Mountain" (1993), and reprinted in "Monstrous Compendium Annual Volume One" (1994).
turn.10: A sandman is a humanoid-shaped creature from the Elemental Plane of Earth that is usually found in desert terrain.
turn.12: A sandman can cause nearby creatures to fall asleep.
